value: content=Rent One Park is home to the Southern Illinois Miners of the Frontier League.  Constructed prior to the Miners inaugural 2007 season.  With the exception of a dirt mound, Rent One Park features a playing surface covered entirely with artificial grass.  The team has led the league in attendance in each of its three seasons of existence.

Quality Inn  2600 W. Main St.  (618) 993-6221.  Located in the heart of Southern Illinois, the hotel is near many of the region's major employers including, Ameren CIPS, GTE North, Pennzoil Products, etc.  Secure Online Reservations.

Comfort Suites  2608 W. Main St.  (618) 997-9133.  This Gold Hospitality Award winning hotel features 64 beautifully decorated double and king suites each with distinct sleeping and work/leisure areas.
